ygData.subject: Re: questions about city of mist
ygData.msgSnippet: ... how ... full party ... classes Hiyas!  I ve been spending extensive time here with my cleric of late so maybe I can help out.  One group is fine if you
ygData.messageBody:
--- In eqbards@egroups.com, "Cyr, Thierry" <thierry.cyr@e...> wrote:
> i've heard a couple of horror stories about this place, but
how
> tough is it to get to the second floor with a party consisting of
full party
> 52-55 or maybe even 2 parties. Time to equip some of robe wearing
classes

Hiyas! I've been spending extensive time here with my cleric of late
so maybe I can help out. One group is fine if you aren't fighting
reavers. Two groups 52 - 55 can do the top reaver, I saw 40+ level
45-60 players get cleaned up by the lower one Sunday. Apparantly a
nasty AoE that took down 15 or so players in each cast. Reavers are
melee only so bring plenty of tanks and clerics.

> with the ornate rune shield. Any tips/tricks/info would be greatly
> appreciated. another question, does invis undead or invis work in
this
> place?

Forget it, they see through everything except rogue sneak/hide. The
spawn time is slow enough (17 mins?) that you can clear out and area,
move camp up, rinse, repeat until you get where you are going.
Outdoor zone, so trains can get rough as SoW'd players try and run
for
the zone to get out of trouble, set up off the tracks.

Erick Seablade
Ezrick Blackpriest
{Kel'Daoine}
Tarew Marr

>
> -Rakka
> Sol Ro
